string.title: String
string.description: The String object is used to represent and manipulate a sequence of characters.

number.title: Number
number.description: Number values represent floating-point numbers like 37 or -9.25.

array.title: Array
array.description: The Array object, as with arrays in other programming languages, enables storing a collection of multiple items under a single variable name.

boolean.title: Boolean
boolean.description: The Boolean object represents a truth value: true or false.

object.title: Object
object.description: The Object type represents one of JavaScript's data types. It is used to store various keyed collections and more complex entities.

function.title: Function
function.description: The Function object provides methods for functions.

regexp.title: RegExp
regexp.description: The RegExp object is used for matching text with a pattern.

promise.title: Promise
promise.description: The Promise object represents the eventual completion of (failure) of an asynchornous operation and its resulting value.

error.title: Error
error.description: Error objects are thrown when runtime errors occur.

htmlelement.title: HTMLElement
htmlelement.description: The HTMLElement interface represents any HTML element.
